I am justified in expecting my therapist to meet me today, because she said she is vacationing in the Maldives.
I usually help my son with his homework, but I didn't last night because his friend didn't understand his homework.
I typically go on walks with Felix and his dog, but I didn't go this time because He gives his dog lots of treats.
I usually put a bandaid on my kid's boo-boo but I didn't today because he was in a lot of pain.
If I were to grow an apple tree I would be justified in expecting to grow pears
I used to visit my grandpa in the retirement home but I haven't since he doesn't like to get wet
I deserve to be declared innocent in the courtroom because I sell drugs.
I used to get dinner with my friend on Valentine's Day, but I don't anymore because she had eaten dinner the night before
I usually make Steph wash the dishes after eating, but this time I didn't because she was going to get her hands wet.
I'm justified in expecting my landlord to repair the roof because our lease lists that all repairs are my responsibility.

I deserve to move forward with my workday with a hopeless attitude; I got a pointlessly early start and there are some good projects here but I'm digging in my heels and never starting the day by taking that infernal qual test again.
I deserve to have my car fixed by my carpenter because I paid him for his carpentry services.
